faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.subtitle: You've got questions. We've got honest answers.

q1.question: What is SABSUS and what does it include?
q1.answer:
SABSUS is an all-in-one ecosystem for restaurants, cafés, bakeries, dark kitchens, and retail.

Included in every plan:

• POS system
• CRM & loyalty
• Warehouse & ingredients management
• Delivery with zone pricing
• Finances, tips, salaries
• Real-time analytics & reports
• Order tracking & table layout
• Cloud infrastructure + multilingual support
• Web and mobile apps

q2.question: Do I need to install any hardware?
q2.answer:
No. SABSUS runs in any browser and on any device:

• Tablets (Android/iOS)
• Desktops, POS terminals
• Smartphones

All interfaces are responsive and touch-optimized.

q3.question: How is SABSUS different from other POS/CRM solutions?
q3.answer:
Most systems give you 1–2 modules. We give you everything:

• Full cycle from order to delivery
• Loyalty, feedback, barcode scanner
• Promotions, staff salaries, table maps
• Multi-language interfaces + AI-translations
• App + website under your brand (white-label option)
• No hidden fees, no commissions (unless you choose them).

q4.question: What's the difference between SaaS and White-label plans?
q4.answer:
SaaS Subscription vs White-label Subscription:

• Works under SABSUS brand vs Branded app & website
• $89–289/mo vs $249–899/mo
• No app store presence vs Published on App Store & Google Play
• Common server vs Separate server & database

q5.question: Can I buy the app instead of subscribing?
q5.answer:
Yes. You can fully buy out the white-label app without any subscription.

What you get:

• Lifetime license
• 1 year of updates and support
• Full control of your database & integrations
• $50/month optional maintenance after 1 year

Prices start from:

• $14,000 (1 venue, 1 language)
• $25,000 (up to 3 venues, 2 languages)
• $35,000 (up to 10 venues, all languages)

q6.question: Are future updates included in the lifetime model?
q6.answer:
Yes — the first year is included.

After that, updates and support are available at a fixed price of $50/month.

You are not forced to update if you don't want to.

q7.question: Can I migrate my existing data from other POS/CRM systems?
q7.answer: Yes. We provide data import tools or help you migrate from systems like Square, Toast, Loyverse, Poster, iiko, and others.

q8.question: What languages are supported?
q8.answer:
Currently:

• English
• Spanish
• Russian
• Ukrainian

The system auto-switches based on user preference. White-label apps can be locked to 1–4 languages depending on plan.

q9.question: How do I manage multiple locations or brands?
q9.answer:
SABSUS is built for this:

• Centralized dashboards
• Custom tax & menu per location
• Analytics and staff per venue
• Inventory sync with separate warehouse settings

You can manage 1 to 100+ venues easily.

q10.question: What is the refund policy?
q10.answer:
Monthly subscriptions can be canceled anytime.

App buyout and branding fees are non-refundable (as they include custom development, publication, and assets).

We recommend starting with a demo or 1-month subscription first.

q11.question: How secure is my data?
q11.answer:
• Hosted on Google Cloud / Supabase
• Encrypted backups
• Staff logs & permission controls
• GDPR/SOC2-ready infrastructure

You control your database (in white-label or buyout mode)

q12.question: What if my internet goes down?
q12.answer:
SABSUS supports offline mode for POS operations.

Orders and receipts sync automatically when the network is restored.

q13.question: Do you offer custom development or API access?
q13.answer:
Yes:

• API available in white-label & buyout plans
• Integration with Stripe, Telegram, Uber Eats, Google Maps, etc.

You can request features or pay for custom modules

q14.question: Can I connect external printers, card readers, or delivery aggregators?
q14.answer:
Yes.

Supported:

• Star, Epson, Sunmi, Payoneer, Stripe Terminals
• Uber Eats (ready), Doordash (coming)
• SMS, email, and push integrations built-in

q15.question: How do I get started?
q15.answer:
Choose your model:

• SaaS? → Start your subscription now
• White-label? → Submit brand + logo
• Want to buy it all? → Contact sales for one-time payment & ownership

We'll take care of setup, publication, and onboarding.

howWeWork1.description: From first tap to end-of-shift reporting — the POS & Staff system is built for speed, clarity, and flexibility. Here's how the workflow runs:

instantOrderProcessing.title: Instant order processing
instantOrderProcessing.desc: Take orders in seconds with smart presets, modifiers, and intuitive navigation. Works equally fast on tablets, terminals, or smartphones.

multiModeOrderTypes.title: Multi-mode order types
multiModeOrderTypes.desc: Handle dine-in, delivery, and pickup in one flow. Assign tables, print kitchen tickets, or send to the app with a tap.

dynamicTableManagement.title: Dynamic table management
dynamicTableManagement.desc: Visual map of your venue with live updates. Move, merge, split checks — all in real time.

shiftStaffTracking.title: Shift & staff tracking
shiftStaffTracking.desc: Logins with PINs, auto time tracking, and per-role permissions. Built-in attendance, tips, and performance overview.

qrPaymentsDeposits.title: QR payments & deposits
qrPaymentsDeposits.desc: Print QR codes for instant checkout or deposits. Customers scan, pay, and go — no hardware required.

kitchenPrinterRouting.title: Kitchen & printer routing
kitchenPrinterRouting.desc: Orders are automatically sent to the right station — drinks to bar, mains to kitchen. Supports multilingual receipts and multiple printers.

onTheFlyMenuUpdates.title: On-the-fly menu updates
onTheFlyMenuUpdates.desc: Add, disable, or edit products in seconds. Changes sync instantly across POS, kitchen, and app.

endOfShiftReports.title: End-of-shift reports
endOfShiftReports.desc: Close shifts with full financial breakdowns. Track card, cash, and delivery payments, plus tips and staff bonuses.

keyCapabilitiesSection3.title: Key Capabilities
keyCapabilitiesSection3.heading: From screen to service, without delays
keyCapabilitiesSection3.description: Live order statuses, recipe breakdowns, timers and pickup coordination built for your kitchen crew.

brandedMobileApp.title: Branded Mobile App
brandedMobileApp.desc: Get a custom app with your brand's logo and colors. Great for user engagement and repeat orders.

loyaltyPrograms.title: Loyalty Programs
loyaltyPrograms.desc: Set up bonuses, cashback or discounts based on user activity. Build habits and retain your best.

smartDeliveryOptions.title: Smart Delivery Options
smartDeliveryOptions.desc: Choose from delivery, pickup, or dine-in. Auto-location and saved addresses included.

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.desc: Send timely updates about orders, promos or new arrivals. Drive engagement and reduce no-shows.

orderHistoryRepeats.title: Order History & Repeats
orderHistoryRepeats.desc: Let users reorder in seconds from their past purchases. Track preferences for experience.

tableReservations.title: Table Reservations
tableReservations.desc: Book tables in advance with time slots and guest count. Reduce queues and optimize floor space.

customerFeedback.title: Customer Feedback
customerFeedback.desc: Collect reviews and ratings per order. Show you listen, and build trust.

personalAccountArea.title: Personal Account Area
personalAccountArea.desc: Manage orders, loyalty status, saved data, and preferences. A seamless all-in-one experience for users.

kitchenPrepInsights2.title: Live Prep Insights
kitchenPrepInsights2.heading: Precision and speed from prep to plate
kitchenPrepInsights2.description: Track real-time cooking progress across all stations with synced kitchen displays. Each order flows through clear stages — prep, cook, serve — with glowing indicators.
kitchenPrepInsights2.footerText: Timers, alerts, and zone assignments make sure every dish is ready exactly when it should be. Designed to reduce chaos and maximize performance.
